attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the MP's expenses situation, I no longer trust the present parliament to handle the serious issues facing the United Kingdom with integrity.
If you believe as I do that the majority of current MP's are no longer trustworthy then please show your support for this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
